title: BRIEF-Beijing BDStar Navigation's unit plans asset acquisition
text:
BRIEF-Beijing BDStar Navigation's unit plans asset acquisition Sept 16 
Sept 16 Beijing BDStar Navigation Co Ltd 
* Says unit plans to buy 60 percent stake in tech firm for 180 million yuan ($28.26 million) 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1QFvOTY 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3694 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
